phrases: Let us do a Chri-Pa, guys!
We can reserve a karaoke room or something.
I am going to Comiket on Christmas Eve, so I cannot.
It is the day everyone looks forward to the most!
It somehow fell on the same day this year!
That is not what I mean!
I mean, what is Comiket anyway?
Apparently it is the country's largest doujinshi exhibition sale.
You said you went during summer break, too, right?
If you went over summer, is not that enough?
Christmas Eve only comes once a year!
A perfect end to the year!
I am sorry, but my year is not complete until I attend Comiket!
S-She is made up her mind.
There is a history study group there, too.
These days, there is more there than just manga and anime.
It is spread to other genres, too!
I want to see them all!
That way, we can close out the year and have a party, all at once.
Oh, but Serinuma-san, were you already going with someone?
The friend I always go with has plans,
If you could all make it, I would be overjoyed!
We will go to Comiket, and have a party on the way home!
Why are we meeting so early?
If we do not go early, all the books will be gone.
This guide has what you need to know, like proper etiquette and history.
So make sure to read it on the train.
We might be the first on board.
Let us hurry up and buy books so we can come back and party after.
What is up with this crowd?!
Are all these people going to Comiket?
It is still only seven in the morning!
and the platform had so many people...
Do not force the doors open!
Do not throw away your hope!
The staff workers are screaming like crazy.
What the heck is all this?!
I wonder if it is because it is Christmas Eve.
I think there is fewer people this year than last...
We do not want to get separated.
Those in general admittance, please come this way!
We will wait here until the doors open.
And it is 7:30 right now, so...
Waiting out here will get cold, so feel free to use them.
there would be another hour before they could enter.
As we discussed, let us split into three groups and finish this shopping list.
Are you really all right with helping me shop?
Well, we do not have anything we want for ourselves.
We can get everything faster if we split up.
Everyone, thank you so much for helping me out, even though I am acting so selfish.
The stuff she wants is BL.
That, and I think these girls are picturing something funny.
Um, can we have the new issue that went on sale today?
He is perfectly mastered that this is just for someone else look!
You lose if you let something like this get to you.
Let us keep going like this.
It is the next next booth over.
The next one's right here, too.
It is like they are carpet bombing the place.
They are doing the crab walk.
Give me all the new issues!
Oh, uh, thank you very much!
Did you make this all by yourself?
I cannot draw, so you have my respect.
Let us get this over with!
Besides, it is a while before our meetup time.
I want to finish this up quickly and get out of here.
There are too many people, the books are heavy, it is cold outside, but hot inside.
The place is dusty, too big, and we are walking too much!
It feels like I could lose you at any second!
Then how about I try this?
After we are done, I would like to go see the history study group.
I suppose this is better than you getting lost.
Guess the others are not here yet.
We did say we were meeting at 2:00.
I have got to thank them all properly.
I wonder what would be good...
Can you strike a pose for me?
Just let me take a few shots!
If you call yourself a photographer,
should not you carry yourself with decorum?
It is not at all acceptable to take photos of a lady who refuses.
People like you give us a bad name!
Y-You are not going to do this sort of thing again, right?
You are letting him off with that?
Trouble-making punks like that crop up from time to time.
Y-You are Sebastian from Gray Butler right?
Our phones had bad reception, too.
Thanks for all your hard work!
You already have so many princes.
You guys should keep a better eye on her.
Oh, well, he just helped me out.
Well then, I will leave the rest to your princes, and excuse myself, my lady.
Serinuma-san, did he do anything to you?!
I got tangled up with a creep earlier and he helped me!
If only we were not so late...
You are the ones going along with my selfish whims.
I am the one who is sorry!
We just have to go back now.
It was my first time, but I had a lot of fun.
The traffic on the way back was an even worse hell than when they came.
So, by the time they arrived
for their closing celebration and Chri-Pa...
all the boys had the energy level of corpses.
That is what happens at your first Comiket.
It takes a lot out of you.
I am weaker than them, yet I feel great!
Well that is because you had moe power.
There was a super cool Sebastian there, too.
If only I had taken one!
I am honored to hear that.
You are a student at this school?!
She is a first year-like you, Shinomiya-kun.
You did not know about her?
More like, she was a girl all along?
I thought she was a male cosplayer at the winter Comiket,
so this was a big shock.
But after talking to her, it turns out we get along perfectly.
You have not gone home yet?
What are you doing for New Year's?
When third semester starts, come hang out with us third-years again.
Help us with the first match of the new year again!
What is with this feeling of defeat?
You know what this is, do not you?
Even if that is the case...
If we say anything, we lose!
In any case, it is definitely a surprise to see you here in our school.
But it cannot be just a coincidence.
I had heard various rumors about Serinuma-senpai before Comiket,
but meeting her there truly was a coincidence.
It is too good to be true.
A coincidence that is too good to be true...
I want to value the bond we have.
Please, allow me to invite you over to my house.
We will talk the night away about Mirage Saga.
Talk the night away about Mirage Saga?!
We also really want to all night about this Mirage Saga.
Let us talk until our throats are raw!
It sounds like it will be fun.
You are all interested in Mirage Saga now?
Well, you know, now that I have gotten a taste for it...
But I would appreciate if you could listen to a small request of mine.
My room is on the third floor.
really feels like she popped out of some 2D universe.
I get what you are trying to say.
This room is mainly for my figure collection.
You have so many Shion figures!
I bought this one from last year's Wonder Festival.
I have heard of this one!
This is by that super famous sculptor,
and it is a completely made-to-order garage kit model!
It is like a magic spell.
Yes, they are just plastic models, though.
These are all the clothes I have made up until now.
You can make just about anything, cannot you, Shima-chan?
The dress you made for Shinomiya-kun was simply marvelous.
I told you not to say that!
Are you making fun of me?
I would never make fun of you.
You idiot, you are too easy!
I just told you to be careful!
She is quite the smooth talker, however...
The room I want to show you the most is this way.
light novels, special bound books, limited books,
These shelves are like the perfect BL collection!
It is a Zebra Stripe book.
She is got all of them.
Even the old ones that I do not have!
Is not that the author we lined up for the other day?
You cannot be good at that many things!
Are you some kind of god?!
Y-Yokojima-sensei, m-may I shake your hand?
If it makes you happy, I will draw for you anytime.
Get a hold of yourself, Serinuma!
I can draw just as good!
A 3 is a perfectly average grade!
She is rich, beautiful, smooth talking, able to do anything.
It is like she is a walking life hack!
I cannot beat her in any way!
This is Shion, is not it?
I mean, it is garbage, is not it?
That is not true at all!
Well, if you are happy with it...
She is fine with anything as long as it is Shion.
Now, do you all remember how I said I had a request?
I want to use you as models,
You just want to take our pictures?
What do you mean by since we are all here?
You mean, since all these hot guys are here together, right?!
It is definitely good to go back to basics.
It seems they are unaware of it themselves.
Maybe even some senpai-kouhai stuff here.
Igarashi-kun with Nanashima-kun. Mutsumi-senpai with Shinomiya-kun.
Lean into each other a bit.
Part your lips just a tad!
Now how about resting your chin on his shoulder?
Shinomiya-kun, you use the same laundry detergent as me.
It smells good, does not it?
Next, please lay your head on the other's lap.
We are not going to do that, idiot!
I think we have already done enough.
It will be faster if we show them how it is done.
This is how you do it!
Gently lay your hand on their face,
and subtly portray love, which is good.
Then, bring your face closer to your partner's,
What the heck are you doing, Nishina?!
That one does not count, okay?
Hey, idols do that stuff in music videos all the time!
I said that was not a joke.
We will have a problem if you do not start taking me seriously.
Her first kiss is with a handsome girl.
Serinuma-senpai, you always make food look so delicious when you eat it.
And the way you eat is very pretty.
I like eating with you, too!
I can eat quite a bit, though.
But you are not fat at all.
Do not tell me you are on a diet.
I have not done anything special.
Everyone in my family's the same way.
Oh, maybe that is because when I was little,
I used to steal my brother's candies and eat'them all up!
Next time: Back to My Original Self!
When it comes down to it, you are pretty fond of your bro
